title: The Butterfly Dreams
description: A mystery, a love story and a searching inquiry into our deepest the origin of consciousness, the fiction of matter, the truth of dreaming, the eternal paradox at the center of being --- and how to live on our benevolent, but fragile planet, in our vast and thinking universe. It's and illuminating glimpse of Divinity to which Science so eloquently points the way.
author: Peter Kline
